text: This should sort #1362, but may make things slower. I took to use monkey patch instead of inheritance as we should be able to handle Nifti1Image, Nifti1Pair and what not, so I think this is the most elegant way. `test_image.py` now fails on master.
title: [WIP] Overriding reducer of SpatialImage

text: I agree this is not a good design : this requires to load in memory all of the nifti images when dispatching them with joblib. But this is the only way to have consistent hashing across pickling, if we are not to modify the joblib hashing code itself (which is what I do in my code, to avoid the memory issue).
Misleading name, this is not a factory
